notes.text: IconExplorer MockServer
ListBase: selectAll parameter added
SAP Icons v3.9 update
Theme Parameter Toolbox Demoapp
sap.m.CustomTile, sap.m.StandardTile, sap.m.Tile, sap.m.TileContainer deprecated
sap.m.GenericTile: ariaLabel property added
sap.m.MessagePopover: Lower default height
sap.m.MessageStrip: Ability to display formatted text added
sap.m.Panel: Additional parameter added to expand event
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Ability to display a subset of the default built-in views added.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Extend appointmentSelect event with DOM reference to the appointment
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: showDayNamesLine property introduced
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Display-only mode implemented.
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Density mode implementation
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Display mode is added
sap.m.Tree: Add support for automatic busy indicator handling
sap.m.Tree: ToggleOpenState event added
sap.m.UploadCollection: Added generic thumbnail icon support
sap.m.Wizard - Current step association added
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: showDayNamesLine in IE fixed
Accessibility pages improved
Corrected shared-config.js path
DatePicker: Setting dateValue doesn't focus the input
FacetFilter: Button text is updated when a list items binding is updated
Form: Link in Toolbar is not aligned
IconExplorer OPA test fix
IconExplorer OPA tests restructuring
IconExplorer alignment fixes
P13nColumnsPanel: Selected Row is not highlighted
P13nColumnsPanel: focus remains in search field on entering text
Personalization Dialog: Refactoring P13nColumnsPanel
Personalization Dialog: Refactoring P13nColumnsPanel (II)
Personalization Dialog: Refactoring P13nColumnsPanel (III)
Personalization Dialog: Refactoring P13nColumnsPanel (KM)
Remove Cyrillic characters from the code
Table Title Fixed
Theme Parameter Toolbox expert filter
Theme Parameter Toolbox relative links
local less parameter names
local less parameter names for sap.m
m.Menu: Header border and menu padding are fixed for phone
sap.m.ActionSelect: Focus indication of items when a button is focused removed
sap.m.ActionSheet: Fix ArialablledBy for buttons.
sap.m.Button: Has correct border in disabled state in HCB and HCW
sap.m.Button: Has correct focused state in a transparent Toolbar in HCB and HCW themes
sap.m.Button: Text has correct color, disabled button no hover in overflowToolbar
sap.m.Button: remove rendering of bdi tag for IE and Edge
sap.m.Button: removed border inside floating footer
sap.m.Column - explicitly detach media listener before removing the range set
sap.m.ComboBox: Bottom border is now correct
sap.m.ComboBox: Bound selectedKey is now updated on model change
sap.m.ComboBox: ComboBox doesn't throw an error when sap.ui.core.Item is used
sap.m.ComboBox: Fix failing qUnit tests.
sap.m.ComboBox: Highlighting of values with special characters handled properly
sap.m.ComboBox: Input value is updated wrong if typing fast
sap.m.ComboBox: Properly updating item's selection on model change.
sap.m.ComboBox: setSelectedKey does not overwrite the model anymore
sap.m.ComboBox: setSelectedKey handles unbinded value improperly
sap.m.ComboBox: valueStateText to be hidden when valueState is None
sap.m.ComboBoxTextField: The text should always be aligned left
sap.m.DatePicker: Choosing date equal to the mindate/maxdate from picker is supported.
sap.m.DatePicker: Data binding with sap.ui.model.odata.type.ODataType subtypes now works correctly
sap.m.DatePicker: Focus is reset after date select on desktop touch devices
sap.m.DateTimeInput: value property binding type different than control type is supported now.
sap.m.DateTimePicker: Month and year picker layout corrected
sap.m.Dialog: Header contents are now vertically centered correctly in compact mode
sap.m.FaceFilter: Reset button has correct focus
sap.m.FacetFilter: items read only once
sap.m.FeedListItem: Special characters in the sender property are displayed correctly
sap.m.FeedListItem: Styling of span tags corrected for the text area
sap.m.FormattedText: JSDoc documentation improvement
sap.m.HeaderContainer: Left padding for MSIE corrected
sap.m.HeaderContainer: Overflow button placement in compact mode corrected
sap.m.IconTabBar: Selecting tab via API ia now correct
sap.m.IconTabBar: When data model is updated, the selected tab is now correct
sap.m.Image: DetailBox aggregation lifecycle improvement
sap.m.Input: Marking event when arrow keys up/down are pressed is now fixed.
sap.m.Input: Suggestion items in Korean are now correctly selected in Chrome
sap.m.Label: Label is now correctly aligned with the sap.m.Link in a HorizontalLayout
sap.m.Label: Last letter is no longer cut in the InfoToolbar
sap.m.List: Screenreader announcement of required state
sap.m.ListItemBase: Tooltip should be announced.
sap.m.Menu: Item separator position and height corrected
sap.m.MessageBox: details initialization is fixed
sap.m.MessagePopover: Items are now cloned in the MessageView
sap.m.MessagePopover: items aggregation type updated
sap.m.MessageStrip: Provided text alternative for close button
sap.m.MessageStrip: restore internal use of sap.m.Text control
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Prevent the soft keyboard to be opened when opening the dropdown list
sap.m.MultiComboBox: compact-mode fix
sap.m.MultiInput: Cut functionality now works correctly in IE
sap.m.MultiInput: Duplicate token entry now handled correctly
sap.m.MultiInput: Long tokens are now correctly displayed
sap.m.MultiInput: Prevents further handling on the token delete event
sap.m.MultiInput: Tokens scrolling is now correct when control is inside a list
sap.m.MultiInput: tokenUpdate event now supports prevent default
sap.m.NewsContent: Method setContentText corrected
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Text is cut correctly when notification is truncated
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: Has correct default color
sap.m.ObjectHeader - icon support keyboard press event for responsive mode as well.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Title wraps on phone
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Tooltip text can now be added for the ObjectHeader icon.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: qunit checking background color is corrected
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: renderer does not invalidate itself anymore.
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Title wraps on phone
sap.m.Panel: Content height is now calculated responsively
sap.m.Panel: Content's height is set wrong when the panel property is specified
sap.m.Panel: Flickering in IE when panel has scrollable content
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: sap.m.Label added to clarify the Explored app examples
sap.m.Popover - properly disable scrolling
sap.m.Popover, sap.m.Input - Suggestion scrolling
sap.m.Popover: Do not use jQuery dimension methods on init.
sap.m.Popover: Fix failing qUnit tests.
sap.m.Popover: Vertical calculations in IE fixed
sap.m.QuickView: Header image/icon now has correct ARIA reading
sap.m.QuickView: Title is no longer truncated in IE
sap.m.QuickViewCard: Wrapping of mail link added
sap.m.RadioButton: Focus outline handled correctly for empty text value
sap.m.RadioButton: test page improved
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: ACC page is now working
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Insert button in out of bounds index now works correctly
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: removeAllButtons does not destroy aggregations
sap.m.RangeSlider: Change & LiveChange events are now fired properly on click.
sap.m.RangeSlider: Handle range change with progress bar correctly
sap.m.RangeSlider: Properly fire liveChange event.
sap.m.RangeSlider: Whole range moved correctly when range is exceeded
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Public functions are now displayed in the API reference.
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Select fires only once for overflowed buttons
sap.m.Select: Issue with aria-activedescentant
sap.m.Select: Select in Dialog issue fixed
sap.m.SelectDialog: Sample page corrected
sap.m.SelectList: Corrected SelectList focus
sap.m.SelectList: Corrected SelectList focus
sap.m.SelectionDetails: Word-breaking behavior for long texts added
sap.m.Shell: Support of TitleLevel added
sap.m.Slider: Correct character encoding
sap.m.Slider: Slider in not cut off in compactMode anymore
sap.m.Slider: fix focus style
sap.m.SplitApp: Acc page is now working correctly
sap.m.SplitContainer: Header color in master view is now correct
sap.m.SplitContainer: Initial flickering when mode="HideMode" is now removed
sap.m.SplitContainer: SplitConatiner footer selector is correct
sap.m.StepInput: Now checks if the increase and decrease buttons are created in constructor
sap.m.StepInput: Now fires change event on focus out
sap.m.Switch - Improved touch/slide detection
sap.m.Switch: Text ellipsis for labels removed
sap.m.TabStrip: Now IE is calculating correctly whether scrolling is needed
sap.m.Table: Wrong colspan calculation is fixed for nodata cases.
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Transparent subheader while loading fixed
sap.m.Text: Cut multi-line text in Chrome, Mozilla corrected
sap.m.Text: MaxLines property documentation corrected
sap.m.TextArea: IE11 new line is doubled.
sap.m.TextArea: Qunit assertions improved
sap.m.TextArea: Testing touch event is now corrected
sap.m.TextArea: fix rendering error
sap.m.TextArea: focus styling fixed
sap.m.TextArea: rows behaviour fixed on Safari
sap.m.TileContainer - rendering of tiles is now performance optimized.
sap.m.TileContent: Semantic color of footer corrected
sap.m.Token: Delete button is now correctly displayed on iPad
sap.m.Token: Delete button is now correctly visible in compact mode
sap.m.Token: Fire press event after triggering delete event fixed.
sap.m.Tokenizer: Focus issue fixed
sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokenizer now gets focus after token delete
sap.m.Tree: adjust css for Treeitem
sap.m.Tree: make long word wrap
sap.m.UploadCollection: FileName property handling improved
sap.m.UploadCollection: Focus after item deletion corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Focus handling in HCB and belize_hcb improved
sap.m.UploadCollection: Key chain navigation improved
sap.m.UploadCollection: Provide access to internal request header parameters to allow setting header parameter "Access-Control-Allow-Headers"
sap.m.UploadCollection: Tooltip rendering improved
sap.m.UploadCollection: Tooltip rendering in IE11 corrected
sap.m.ViewSettingDialog: "Select all" style fixed
sap.m.ViewSettingDialog: testsuite example read correctly
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Reset filter icon changed
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Select all does not trigger re-rendering
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Set correct content in Static area
sap.m.Wizard - _getNextStepreference() returns a wrong result if the sebsequentSteps have a length of 1
sap.m.Wizard: Sample improvement
sap.m.demokit.tutorial.worklist: fix opa tests
sap.m.demokit.tutorial.worklist: fix opa tests on Chrome 58
sap.m: Wrong character encoding fixed
sap.ui.fl changeHandler needs to store dependencies
sap.m.Label: Property displayOnly added
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Direct navigation to a date
sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: New control with two lists of items implemented.
sap.m.Button: centered icon and text
sap.m.Button: revert centered icon and text fix
sap.m.MessageStrip: Line height when an unformatted text is used is now fixed
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Header text is visualized correctly
sap.m.SlideTile: Unnecessary CSS selector removed
sap.m.MenuItem: Press event is now fired
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - appointment row focus outline covers all 4 sides for High Contrast Black & High Contrast White themes.
sap.m.StepInput: Add missing valueStateText property
sap.m.TimePicker - AM/PM slider values for all languages are being read by Screen Reader
sap.m.UploadCollection: Deletion handling corrected
sap.m.Button: Press event fired twice after UI adaptation
sap.m.InputBase: Hidden element that holds the placeholder value is of a correct type.
sap.m.SemanticPage: Added backgroundDesign property.
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
ShellHeader Layout fixed
sap.m.ActionSheet: Improved accessibillity speech output in IE
sap.m.FeedContent: Documentation issues solved
sap.m.MessageStrip: Prevents announcing the control information multiple times.
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Prevent endless focus loop on mobile
sap.m.MultiInput: Do not tokenize text when ValueHelp is opened.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: SpecialDates are destroyed correctly
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: direct navigation to date bugs fixed
sap.m.SearchField: Unnecessary 'suggest' events are not fired any more
sap.m.ViewSettingsPopover - title is always propagated to dialog aria label.
sap.m.Wizard: Regression in discardProgress fixed
sap.m.delegate.ValueStateMessage: Value state text reading corrected
sap.m.FacetFilterList: keep selection when growing occurs.
sap.m.FeedListItem: Improved the removal of empty HTML tags
sap.m.Input: Value help icon is now correct in rtl in Chrome
sap.m.Label: Label is rendered as span when used decorative
sap.m.MaskInput-on Firefox if the cursor is at the beginning of the field, left arrow does nothing.
sap.m.MenuItem - setting key does not throw an error anymore.
sap.m.MultiInput: suggestionItemSelected event is now fired only once
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: correct different height of the ObjectAttributeDiv between IE and Chrome
sap.m.ObjectHeader: even if they are no statuses set, markers are rendered.
sap.m.Panel: avoid showing duplicate icon focus outlines
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: selecting appointments fires event in OneMonth view on small screen size
sap.m.RadioButton: Fire select event with keyboard handling.
sap.m.SelectionDetails: Rendering improved
sap.m.SelectionDetailsItemLine: Rendering of date and time improved
sap.m.Table: Reset padding when there is no visible header.
sap.m.TextArea: Adjust height on setValue()
sap.m.TextArea: _adjustHeight before control is rendered
sap.m.Label: Label wrapping has been enabled outside of Form context
sap.m.BarInPageEnabler: Bars no longer care about the context they're used in (i.e. header, footer, etc.)
sap.m.FacetFilter: Properly update selectedKeys cache when model changes
sap.m.FacetFilter: Update on a model remembers selection properly
sap.m.GenericTile: Vertical alignment improved
sap.m.IconTabBar:  Actual positions and size of the tabs are now read correctly
sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus is now clearly visible
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tabs info is now read correctly by JAWS
sap.m.MessagePopover: Models should be forwarded to the internal MessageView
sap.m.MultiInput: Fixed setTokens() to remove all tokens
sap.m.NavContainer: Navigation now works correctly when the pages are destroyed during animation
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Renders an invisible placeholder when it is empty
sap.m.Page: properly show floatingFooter when PageAccessibleLandmark info is used
sap.m.RadioButton: Problem with the position of the dot when a browser is zoomed fixed
sap.m.RangeSlider: Tooltips are now properly swapped when range is reversed.
sap.m.UploadCollection: Runtime error after item deletion in pending mode corrected
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: onCancel now do not modify filter selection
sap.m.WizardProgressNavigator: Navigation works now correctly on mobile
sap.m.FacetFilter: Does not log error on combi device and type Light
sap.m.FacetFilter: Update button text properly when SingleSelectMaster mode is used
sap.m.Link: removed href attribute if property href is not set
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: AriaLabelledBy correctly set on the active title
sap.m.Panel: fix focus outline in IE
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Cloned item now works with binding
sap.ui.fl Correctly apply changes on xml views
TimePicker-closing before slider scrolling is complete works.
sap.m.ComboBox: Fix highlighting in words with special characters
sap.m.FacetFilter: Correct selection when growing is used.
sap.m.MessagePopover: The headerButton is now being bound correctly
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Long title wraps on Firefox and IE
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Search is now working correctly
sap.m.TileContainer: Moving of tiles fixed
sap.m.TileContainer: Render tiles on ScrollIntoView call
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: when model is changed, filter counter is updated.
sap.m.BreadCrumbs: Fixed keyboard handling for hidden items
sap.m.DateTimePicker-when picker is opened for IE & Edge, input should not be focusable
sap.m.Dialog: Drag and resize are now working correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: Scroll of the items work with arrows
sap.m.GenericTile : Update Arial Label on Generic Tile content change on using TAB key navigation.
sap.m.ListBase: Hide busy indicator on updateFinished.
sap.m.MultiInput: Fire properly change event.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: removed href attribute if property href is not set
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: gets title aggregation correctly now
sap.m.Page: Nested pages scrolling fixed.
sap.m.Popover: Show scrollbar when overflowing and out of visible area.
sap.m.TextArea: Growing property now has a proper behavior.
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Focus handling corrected
sap.m.BarInPageEnabler: remove extra aria-labelledby attribute
sap.m.Button: fire press event on keydown for 'enter' and keyup for 'space'
sap.m.FacetFilter: Reset search value when FacetFilterList is closed
sap.m.FacetFilter: Select All checkbox behavior fix after a search
sap.m.Input: showTableSuggestionValueHelp now works correctly on IE
sap.m.Label: Label is now read by JAWS when focus sap.m.Select
sap.m.ListBase: Footer text should not be announced twice.
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: ObjectAttribute with customContent now omit active property
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: correctly set text of the customControl aggregation
sap.m.ObjectHeader: focus fixed for HCB
sap.m.Page: Documentation updated
sap.m.Page: showHeader property working correctly with floatingFooter
sap.m.Panel: Blurred text in IE
sap.m.Popover: Updated: Show scrollbar when overflowing and out of visible area.
sap.m.SearchField: 'search' event is now correctly fired
sap.m.StepInput - wrong calculation when value precision is changed.
sap.m.TabContainer: fix height of the TabStrip
sap.m.TabContainer: fix removeItem with 0 as a parameter
sap.m.TileContainer - works if initial width/height is 0.
sap.m.Token/Tokenizer: Not editable token text width in Safari
Control: BusyIndicator animation default
Control: refactor fnHandleInteraction
sap.m.Button: Reference to the text content of the button is added to the AriaLabelledBy only when the button has text
sap.m.Button: focus outline is visible on click
sap.m.DateTimeField: setDateValue accepts JS Date Object from iframe
sap.m.Dialog: correct header, subheader and footer DOM structure
sap.m.Input: Description is now read correctly by JAWS
sap.m.Input: Issue with calling selectedKey from ValueHelp is now fixed.
sap.m.Menu: recreate menu if all items are removed
sap.m.MenuButton: Now when Reject or Accept button is pressed, the icon has correct color
sap.m.MultiInput: Selecting an item now clears the input field

sap.m.Popover: correct header, subheader and footer DOM structure
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Now correctly goes into overflow when used inside OverflowToolbar

sap.m.Slider: sap.m.RangeSlider exception fixed.
sap.m.StandardTreeItem: setIcon function is enhanced
sap.m.Table: Selection column should be hidden from screen readers

sap.m.Tile: Focus is cleared indicated in HCB and HCW

sap.m: Replace non-breaking spaces with normal spaces
